Room.Name: Leviathan Drive/Nagaritha Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Leviathan Drive and Nagaritha Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Leviathan Drive, running north and south, intersects Nagaritha Drive, running east and west, at this point. The large Melbourne Entertainment Arena is located on the northeast corner of the intersection and may be entered along Nagaritha Drive to the east. On the southeast corner is the glorious Shrine of Victory, where many warriors go to offer a sacrifice before a battle.
